title: Putin wanted Kherson. Now, residents say Russia is trying to destroy it.
description: After surviving Russian occupation, residents of Kherson came under relentless fire by Russian bombs. Now, they are trying to survive floodwaters from a catastrophic dam collapse.

title: Scotland’s Sturgeon released from custody after police questioning
description: Detectives in Scotland questioned Nicola Sturgeon, a former first minister, as part of an investigation into the finances of her ruling Scottish National Party.

title: Ukraine’s current counteroffensive may dictate the fate of the war
description: The stakes are high for Ukraine as it appears on the march with its counteroffensive against Russia.

title: Restoring this rare medieval ship means putting 2,500 pieces back together
description: It's a mystery how the ship ended up in Wales, buried under mud for 534 years. But it is the most important late-medieval vessel to be discovered.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky says counteroffensive commanders are in ‘positive mood’
description: Official details are scant, but analysts said Ukraine appears to be attacking on several fronts, including in the Donetsk and Zaporizhzhia regions.
